about_the_game:
Conqueror's Blade - Newcomer Growth Pack

This DLC includes:

7-Day Premium Account *1

Unit Medal *50

Note:

  • After purchasing the DLC, you can claim it from Town Criers at both the regional capital and the Trade Colony.

  • Items from the DLC can only be claimed by one character, so choose your recipient carefully.

  • Items from the DLC cannot be traded within the game.

  • [Unit Medal] can be used to upgrade your units.

  • The effect of Premium Account

    • While it is active all of a player's characters on the same account will get an exclusive avatar frame and the following bonuses.

    • Increased battle rewards:

      • Hero XP +30%

      • Unit XP +30%

      • Bronze Coins +30%

      • Honour +30%

    • Increased Fief and Daily Quest rewards:

      • Hero XP +50%

      • Bronze Coins +50%

      • Honour +50%

    • You will also get +100 Auxiliary Points, more Daily Sign In rewards, and more rewards for completing Weekly Quests.

content_descriptors.notes: Gameplay consists of graphic and realistic-looking depictions of physical conflict, weapons and depictions of human injury and death.
